 and YODA said: Pain, suffering, death I feel. Something terrible has happened. Young Skywalker is in pain. Terrible pain 

 witcher quote: No one wants to suffer. But that is the fate of each. And some suffer more. Not necessarily of their own volition. It's not about to enduring the suffering. It's about how you endure it. 

 Rick and Morty quote: Existence is pain to a meeseeks Jerry, and we will do anything to alleviate that pain.

 and YODA said: Do. Or do not. There is no try. 

 witcher quote: When you know about something it stops being a nightmare. When you know how to fight something, it stops being so threatening. 

 Rick and Morty quote: The first rule of space travel kids is always check out distress beacons. Nine out of ten times it's a ship full of dead aliens and a bunch of free shit! One out of ten times it's a deadly trap, but... I'm ready to roll those dice!
